text: FireAid was a two-venue benefit concert and music-based fundraising event that took place in Inglewood, California, United States, on January 30, 2025. The event, organized by the Annenberg Foundation, raised money to help those affected by the January 2025 Southern California wildfires, as well as funds to help prevent future wildfires in the area. Most of the performers at the event had some connection to the Greater Los Angeles area. The concert ran for six hours. ==References== Category:January 2025 events
title: FireAid
